sn22.84:3.2: PTS has the usual satthā taṃ, āvuso sāriputta, āmanteti, which is presumably omitted by mistake in MS.
sn22.84:4.1: The Buddha’s incredible skill in teaching …
sn22.84:5.3: An obvious typo here in anigata
sn22.84:9.7: Interesting use of muncati and ganhati.
sn22.84:10.15: Wow, that’s a major variant. It looks very much like a commentarial gloss.
